title: Savage Chaos
description: Nolan My deadliest secrets are coming to light. What I thought was buried in my past is heading right for me, threatening my present and future.  Now, I must return to New York City to face the demon taunting me.  Blood coats my hands and stains my soul. Can I defeat the devil lurking in the shadows or will it take me to hell?
author: J. Lynn Lombard
